mapper.update: CREATE TABLE `wu_zi_lei_xing_${qyh}` ( `id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `qyjlId` int NULL DEFAULT NULL, `mc` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL, `cjsj` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL, `bjsj` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL, `px` int NULL DEFAULT NULL, `bz` varchar(300) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL, `qytb` int NULL DEFAULT 1, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE = InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT = 1 CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_general_ci ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;
